// Pivot 0, 0
int CLL_5[18] = {
	3, 9,
	9, 2,
	16, 2,
	22, 9,
	22, 40,
	16, 45,
	9, 45,
	3, 39,
	3, 9
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000

	0.125000f, 0.191489f,
	0.375000f, 0.042553f,
	0.666667f, 0.042553f,
